title: Charming Historic House in Krosno Old Town: Modern Renovation Meets Classic Elegance
description: Revel in the unique character of this beautifully renovated historic house in Krosno's enchanting Old Town. Boasting four spacious bedrooms and three modern bathrooms across 182 square meters, the property ingeniously blends architectural heritage with contemporary comforts. Step into a sun-filled living area featuring a newly renovated kitchen, then flow seamlessly to a lush private garden through elegant patio doors. Bright interiors and thoughtfully designed communal spaces make this an ideal residence for modern living.
neighborhood_description: Located in Krosno's Old Town, enjoy a peaceful neighborhood steeped in history yet influenced by modern development. The area encourages an active, outdoor lifestyle with nearby green spaces and local amenities. Convenient highway access allows for effortless travel, and schools are easily reachable in this tranquil but connected community.
